long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customer Feedback Surveys embedded directly within your email signature. Customers can quickly share feedback with just OneTap Feedback! 

This extension passes the email address from the TO: field and places it in the Survey URL. This is to identify which customer completed the survey.

*NOTE - This extension is designed to solely work with SurveyStance Email Signature Surveys. It is not intended to work in any other capacity.

To learn more about creating an Email Signature Survey please visit
https://www.surveystance.com/email-signature-survey/
